articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: How Rob Walter helped South Africa reach the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 final
articles.description: After 32 years and seven failed attempts, South Africa have finally reached the promised land of a men’s cricket final.
articles.content:
After years of suffering the pain of late tournament knockouts, South Africa stand on the brink history and glory in their first ever ICC Mens Cricket World Cup final.
And after several terms of hig… [+5420 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
